headline: Warner Bros gets mostly cash offer from Netflix in new bidding round - Bloomberg
summary: Investing.com -- Warner Bros Discovery Inc (NASDAQ:WBD) is currently reviewing a second round of bids, including a predominantly cash offer from Netflix Inc (NASDAQ:NFLX), Bloomberg reports, as part of an auction process that could conclude within days or weeks.

raw.headline: Warner Bros gets mostly cash offer from Netflix in new bidding round - Bloomberg
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Warner Bros Discovery Inc (NASDAQ:WBD) is currently reviewing a second round of bids, including a predominantly cash offer from Netflix Inc (NASDAQ:NFLX), Bloomberg reports, as part of an auction process that could conclude within days or weeks.

headline: Netflix would be ‘killing three birds with one stone’ by buying Warner Bros. Discovery, BofA says
summary: The global media industry is standing at the edge of a “historic transformation,” with Warner Bros. Discovery at the “epicenter,” Bank of America said.

raw.headline: Netflix would be ‘killing three birds with one stone’ by buying Warner Bros. Discovery, BofA says

headline: MoffettNathanson’s Robert Fishman on the second-round bid for Warner Bros. Discovery
summary: Robert Fishman, MoffettNathanson senior analyst, joins ‘Squawk on the Street’ to discuss the second-round bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, why his firm has a buy rating on the media giant, and more.

raw.headline: MoffettNathanson’s Robert Fishman on the second-round bid for Warner Bros. Discovery

headline: Suitors submit offers for Warner Bros. Discovery: Puck's Matt Belloni on what to expect
summary: Matt Belloni, Puck founding partner, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the latest developments in the bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, who the top suitors are, potential regulatory hurdles, and more.
